content: I followed the instructions to download Anaconda Navigator on windows, but when I try to launch it through the start menu, a blank console flashes 3 times for about 1 second, and then nothing else happens, so I am unable to access the actual navigator.  I have already tried reinstalling Anaconda and using fixes on the internet, but nothing has worked so far.
subject: Anaconda Navigator not working

content:
You may need to go to office hours, which start Thursday, to have an LA resolve this. Just in case, these are the official install instructions for Windows:

https://docs.anaconda.com/anaconda/install/windows/

Also, try to launch Spyder directly from the start menu. As long as that's working, and you can update it according to our handout, you should be fine.
I had the same issue with the 64-bit version, but the 32-bit one seems to be working fine (I have 64-bit Windows)
